## Size.equals() method

True if the current Size and the given one width and height are strictly equal.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
equals(other: Size): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  other | <code>Size</code> | the other size to compare against |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`

True if the current Size and the given one width and height are strictly equal.
